# Akademiska examina

```{r}
library(tibble)
tribble(
  ~ Degree, ~ Year, ~ Institution, ~ Where,
  "Doktorsexamen i medicinsk vetenskap", "2023", "", "Lunds universitet",
  "Magisterexamen i kognitionsvetenskap", "2013", "", "Linköpings universitet"
) %>% 
  detailed_entries(Degree, Year, Institution, Where)
```
